edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model

Class ActivityList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model.ActivityList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tabular, java.util.Observer

    public class ActivityList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, Tabular
    This class handles a SortedArrayList of Acitivty objects
    Author:
    Jack Wasserman

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the ActivityList name.
        Returns:
        this.name the name of the Activity list

      • addActivity

        public boolean addActivity(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           boolean needSnow,
                           int snowBoundary)
        The method constructs a Activity using the provided parameters and creates a unique id for the activityID using the numActivities. The Activity is added to activities so that the list is always sorted by Activity name. Observers of ActivityList are notified of the change if the Activity is added to activities.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Activity
        description - the description of the Activity
        needSnow - if the Activity needs snow or not
        snowBoundary - how much snow the Activity can or cannot perform in
        Returns:
        true if the Activity is added to the list, false if otherwise

      • getActivities

        public SortedArrayList<Activity> getActivities()
        Gets the ActivityList
        Returns:
        this.activities the SortedArrayList of Activities

      • getActivityAt

        public Activity getActivityAt(int index)
        Returns the Activity at the given index in the activities list.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to retrieve an Activity from in the list
        Returns:
        activity that is at the specified index

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of Activity objects in the activities list.
        Returns:
        numActivities.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Tells if there is one or more activites in the list
        Returns:
        returns true if the activities list is empty and false otherwise.

      • get2DArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] get2DArray()
        Returns an Object[][] array. Each row, i, contains an Activity. [i][0] is the Activity activityID, [i][1] is the Activity name, [i][2] is the Activity description, [i][3] is the Activity needSnow, and [i][4] is the Activity snowBoundary.
        Specified by:
        get2DArray in interface Tabular
        Returns:
        arr the 2d array which holds the activities components

      • indexOfID

        public int indexOfID(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the index of the first occurrence of a Activity that has an exact match to the provided id or -1 if there are no Activity objects with an exact match on the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Activity to get the index of
        Returns:
        i the index that is the location of the specified Activity

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        If a Activity in the Activity List changes, the update() method is automatically called. Activity List should propagate the notification of the change to its Observers IF the Observable o is contained in the activities list. The arg parameter is passed to notifyObservers().
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - the observable that is checked to see if it is contained in the list
        arg - object passed in as argument

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(ActivityListPane activityListPane)
        Adds the observer to Activity List
        Parameters:
        activityListPane - the pane in the GUI that observes Activity List
